features.title: Class Variety
features.description: Access thousands of different fitness classes, from yoga and pilates to HIIT and spinning, all on a single platform.

features.title: Instant Bookings
features.description: Book classes with just one click, no waiting or calls. Confirm your attendance instantly and organize your fitness schedule.

features.title: Flexible Membership
features.description: Choose between different plans according to your needs. No long-term commitments, cancel or change whenever you want.

metadata.title: About TUDO | Our Philosophy
metadata.description: Learn about TUDO's philosophy and the power behind the platform revolutionizing fitness and wellness experiences.

madeToMove.title: MADE TO MOVE
madeToMove.subtitle: OUR DNA
madeToMove.paragraph1: We're more than a service: we're the impulse that transforms movement into wellbeing and purpose.
madeToMove.paragraph2: We believe in the power of progress, of connecting with yourself and the world, of opening doors that expand horizons and break barriers that seemed unbreakable.
madeToMove.paragraph3: It's not just about physical activity, but about the movement of being: a balance between body, mind, and spirit that breaks through the barriers that lead us to surpass ourselves, reminding us that we can always give more than we imagine.

noStrings.title: NO STRINGS, JUST JOY
noStrings.subtitle: OUR VALUE PROMISE
noStrings.paragraph1: We are the space where wellbeing has no strings attached. No commitments, no clauses, just experiences designed to move you, care for you, and let you enjoy at your own pace.
noStrings.paragraph2: Here you can explore new ways to train, relax, and try something different every day. Because feeling good shouldn't come with conditions, but with options.

makeItHappen.title: WE MAKE IT HAPPEN
makeItHappen.subtitle: OUR PURPOSE
makeItHappen.paragraph1: Here we don't just dream big: we make it reality.
makeItHappen.paragraph2: We have no constraints, only opportunities waiting to be conquered. We create an experience where you decide the how, when, and where, because we know you can.
makeItHappen.paragraph3: Our promise is clear: to give you the power to transform your goals into achievements and your intentions into action. Every step you take with us is designed for you to exceed your own standards, discover new possibilities, and live without commitments.
makeItHappen.discoverLink: Discover how we make it happen

hero.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
hero.description: Choose the plan that works best for you. All plans include access to our core features.

saveMoney.title: Save Money with a Plan
saveMoney.description: You can save money with exclusive member rates and promotions for new studios and first-time visits.

howCredits.title: How Credits Work
howCredits.description: Credits can be used to book classes or appointments. The number of credits required for each booking varies based on the type of activity, location, popularity, and time.

example.title: Example: Sarah's Routine
example.description: Sarah has the Plus plan with 50 credits per month. Here's how she uses them:

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to the most common questions about our credit system and membership plans.

howItWorks.question: How does the credit system work?
howItWorks.answer: Our credit system allows you to book classes and sessions at various fitness and wellness venues. Each activity costs a certain number of credits based on factors like class type, location, popularity, and time slot. You receive a set number of credits each month based on your subscription plan, and you can use them however you prefer.

cancelSubscription.question: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
cancelSubscription.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time with no cancellation fees. Your subscription will remain active until the end of your current billing period, and you won't be charged again after that. You can easily manage your subscription from your account settings.

creditsExpire.question: Do unused credits expire?
creditsExpire.answer: Credits roll over for a limited time depending on your plan: Basic plan credits roll over for up to 2 months, Plus plan for up to 3 months, and Premium plan for up to 4 months. After that period, unused credits will expire. This policy encourages regular activity while still giving you flexibility.

changePlan.question: Can I upgrade or downgrade my plan?
changePlan.answer: Yes, you can upgrade, downgrade, or cancel your plan at any time from your account settings. If you upgrade, the change takes effect immediately, and you'll be charged a prorated amount for the remainder of your billing cycle. If you downgrade, the change will take effect at the start of your next billing cycle.

bookClass.question: How do I book a class?
bookClass.answer: You can book classes through our website or mobile app. Simply browse available classes by location, activity type, or time, and reserve your spot using your available credits. You can book classes up to a week in advance, and you'll receive a confirmation email with all the details after booking.

cancellationPolicy.question: What is the cancellation policy for booked classes?
cancellationPolicy.answer: You can cancel a booked class up to 12 hours before the scheduled start time to receive a full credit refund. Cancellations made less than 12 hours in advance will not be refunded. This policy helps ensure that spots remain available for other members and that our partner studios can plan accordingly.

additionalFees.question: Are there any additional fees beyond the subscription?
additionalFees.answer: No, there are no hidden fees. Your monthly subscription covers all the credits you need to book classes. Some premium or special events might require additional credits, but these will be clearly marked, and you'll always see the credit cost before booking.

shareCredits.question: Can I share my credits with friends or family?
shareCredits.answer: Premium plan members can share up to 20 credits per month with friends or family. Basic and Plus plan members cannot share credits, but they can purchase gift cards or invite friends using our referral program to earn bonus credits.

stillQuestions.title: Still have questions?
stillQuestions.description: Our support team is here to help you with any other questions you might have.
